Preprocessing Info.pre_detailed_instructions: When loading the File Equivalent Tables, retrieve and parse from file name

fields.target_attribute: - Library Item Source Aleph Library Name
- Library Item Update LMS Staff Account Identifier

data_quality_checks.instructions: Year is valid and after or equal to 1980.

IF SUBSTR(Z30_OPEN_DATE, 5, 2) in ['01','03','05','07','08','10','12'] THEN
     BETWEEN: 1 - 31
ELSEIF SUBSTR(Z30_OPEN_DATE, 5, 2) in ['04,'06','09','11'] THEN
     BETWEEN: 1 - 30
ELSEIF SUBSTR(Z30_OPEN_DATE, 5, 2) in ['02'] AND Leap-Year = 'No' THEN
     BETWEEN: 1 - 28
ELSEIF SUBSTR(Z30_OPEN_DATE, 5, 2) in ['02'] AND Leap-Year = 'Yes' THEN
     BETWEEN: 1 - 29
Year is valid and after or equal to 1980.

     BETWEEN: 1 - 31

ELSEIF SUBSTR(Z30_OPEN_DATE, 5, 2) in ['02'] AND Leap-Year = 'No' THEN
     BETWEEN: 1 - 28
ELSEIF SUBSTR(Z30_OPEN_DATE, 5, 2) in ['02'] AND Leap-Year = 'Yes' THEN
     BETWEEN: 1 - 29
